attributes.action: Allow driving tests for all keyworkers ASAP
attributes.additional_details: Part way through the first lockdown when restrictions eased my lessons and tests were able to go ahead. Working towards driving is essential both for my current job role and allowing me to further my job prospects in the future. By not allowing driving tests to go ahead, the government is inhibiting progression of the next generation of young people and creating a backlog of people wanting to drive. ALL (not just emergency service) key workers should be granted a test ASAP.
attributes.background: Allow driving tests for key workers to go ahead with immediate effect.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566844
